generalInfo: Journey through Sabah's majestic landscapes, from sacred villages and lush rainforests to wildlife-rich riverbanks, witnessing Borneo's breathtaking nature and cultural treasures. This immersive adventure combines authentic village experiences with thrilling wildlife encounters along the Kinabatangan River.

dayInfo.description: Kota Kinabalu, Malaysia: Smooth Landings & Hassle-Free Arrival Day Warm Welcome at the Airport After touching down, look for our welcoming representative holding a sign with your surname, ready to greet you with a smile. Effortless Airport Transfer Your hassle-free journey continues with a convenient transfer from the airport directly to your accommodation, ensuring a smooth arrival experience. Settle into Your Accommodation Take this chance to unwind and settle into your room so you’re refreshed and ready for the adventure ahead.

Kota Kinabalu, Malaysia: Kiulu Hidden Hillside Village Adventure Scenic Journey to Kiulu Village Depart Kota Kinabalu by 8:00 AM and embark on a picturesque 2-hour drive to the secluded hillside village of Kiulu, nestled on the slopes of Mount Kinabalu. Along the way, absorb breathtaking views and anticipate a day full of cultural discovery. Village Exploration & Cultural Immersion Upon arrival, you’ll be welcomed by your friendly English-speaking host. Begin your adventure with a guided stroll around this ancient settlement, home to villagers who have honored the Mountain God for centuries. Feel the depth of local traditions that have stood the test of time. Authentic Home Visit & Coffee Tasting Visit a villager’s house to indulge in authentic, simple delicacies—prepared just for you. Savor the full journey of Sabah coffee, from freshly-picked beans to an aromatic cup brewed in true local style. Pineapple Factory Experience Next, tour the village’s pineapple factory, a community-run setup providing vital opportunities for local employment. Witness the step-by-step process of pineapple production and see how traditional skills blend with modern initiative. Herbal Walk & Pineapple Farm Adventure In the late afternoon, set out with your host on a guided walk through lush pineapple farms and venture to the village borders in search of unique local herbs. Learn about their culinary and medicinal uses from your knowledgeable guide. Host Family Dinner Conclude your memorable day by sharing a delightful, hearty dinner with your host family—an experience filled with laughter, warmth, and unforgettable flavors.

Kinabalu Park, Malaysia: Village Life & Flavors, City Bound Morning Village School Visit After a hearty breakfast with your hosts, take a stroll to the village’s primary school. Discover daily student life in rural Sabah and join a fun session learning to play the “Gong,” a treasured traditional musical instrument. Buzzing Bee Farm Experience Next, stop by a local, family-run bee farm. Here, you’ll taste freshly-harvested honey and sample local snacks, all while observing the fascinating honey-making process and chatting with the beekeepers. Fond Farewells & City Journey With new memories in tow, say a heartfelt goodbye to your welcoming host family. Then, leave the peaceful countryside behind as you return to the lively cityscape of Kota Kinabalu.

Kinabalu - Sepilok: Seamless Transfer & Flight to Sandakan Morning Preparation & Check-Out Get ready for your next adventure as our friendly representative meets you in your hotel lobby. They'll assist with your check-out and ensure everything's in order for your journey. Pickup is usually scheduled about two hours before your flight departure. Seamless Airport Transfer Relax as you’re chauffeured to Kota Kinabalu Airport in comfort, with plenty of time to spare for a stress-free check-in experience. Flight to Sandakan Take to the skies on a scenic flight from Kota Kinabalu to Sandakan—suggested flight AK 6496 departs at 13:55 and lands at 14:40. (Flight not included, estimated cost: $185, 20kg checked baggage allowance.) Warm Welcome in Sandakan On arrival in Sandakan, our friendly representative—look for your surname on their sign—welcomes you and ensures a hassle-free, private transfer to your next accommodation.

Sepilok: Sunset Safari & (Optional) Sanctuary Encounters Welcome to a Day of Discovery Your adventure begins early with a warm introduction before a scenic drive to Sepilok, surrounded by untouched Bornean rainforest. (Optional) Heartwarming Encounters at Sepilok 08:00 – 11:30 Opt to visit the renowned Sepilok Orangutan Rehabilitation Centre. Watch playful orangutans at feeding time from a forest platform and view a captivating 25-minute documentary about their journey to freedom. Bornean Sun Bear Sanctuary Continue to the Bornean Sun Bear Conservation Centre, where rescued Malayan sun bears are cared for and rehabilitated. Meet these fascinating creatures and learn about vital conservation efforts. Leisurely Countryside Walk Enjoy a peaceful 15-minute stroll through picturesque countryside to reach the sanctuaries, soaking in the natural surroundings. Lunch with Local Flavor Savor a delicious lunch at a local restaurant, sampling authentic regional dishes (included for those on the optional tour). Journey to Kinabatangan River Post-lunch, travel to the banks of the Kinabatangan River and transfer to the charming Borneo Natural Sukau Bilit Resort. Sunset Wildlife River Cruise 16:00 – 18:00 Set off on a mesmerizing sunset cruise along the Kinabatangan River. Keep your camera ready—spot proboscis monkeys, orangutans, macaques, elusive pygmy elephants, unique birds, and more. Wildlife sightings are likely but not guaranteed. Evening at the Resort Return to the resort for a relaxing evening and a hearty dinner surrounded by the sounds of the jungle.

Kinabatangan: Dawn-to-Dusk River and Jungle Adventure Sunrise Wildlife River Cruise Greet the dawn to the lively symphony of gibbons and hornbills as you glide down the river at sunrise. Observe the rainforest spring to life, spotting rare birds and elusive wildlife while the mist hovers over the water, creating an enchanting start to your day. Hearty Breakfast at the Resort Return to the comfort of your resort for a delicious breakfast, where flavors of the local cuisine will prepare you for the day’s adventures. Guided Jungle Trek Embark on a jungle trekking expedition with the resort’s expert guide. Wander through lush greenery, learning about fascinating plants and creatures unique to the area. Capture glimpses of dazzling birds or perhaps even a monkey swinging through the trees. Lunch at the Resort After your trek, relax and refuel with a freshly prepared lunch back at the resort, while sharing stories of your morning adventures. Sunset River Cruise Head back to the water for a magical cruise as the sun begins to set. The golden light illuminates the riverside, and the air is alive with birds and animals making their final appearance before night. Try to spot new species as you soak in the serene beauty. Dinner and Relaxation Return to the resort for a satisfying dinner and reflect on another unforgettable day immersed in nature.

Kinabatangan- Sandakan, Malaysia: Farewell to Kinabatangan Wildlife Sunrise River Adventure Wake just before dawn to embark on one last river cruise. Glide across the serene Kinabatangan River and witness the rainforest awakening—keep your eyes out for monkeys, hornbills, and maybe even wild orangutans in the mist-soaked trees. Final Breakfast at the Lodge Return to your riverside resort and gather for a hearty breakfast, sharing stories and memories of your jungle adventures as the rainforest bustles with morning life. Farewell and Departure Check out and bid farewell to the Kinabatangan. Board your shared transfer for a scenic drive back to Sandakan, carrying home unforgettable wildlife encounters. (Shared transfer available for flights departing after 2 pm.)
